title: innamum shOdanaiyO
sahitya:
innamum shOdanaiyO Ezhai enpAl evar sheida bOdhanaiyO shrI rAmA


anupallavi

  annai tandai guru anbODaNaittuk-kAkkum en kula deivam enrunaiyaDainda pin


caraNam    kannal nAmam kanitturaippavar kali vanmam tIrumenriyambiDum nAnmaraigaL
 anrum innum enrum ambujapAdam pOTri vandanai sheidunran vazhi pArtirukkum enmEl
